DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Single Application Capsaicin 8 % Transdermal Delivery System Compared Placebo Reducing Pain Intensity Subjects With Painful Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathy ( PDPN )
DOC.detailed_description: Participants divide 2 group approximately equal size . In first group , participant receive Capsaicin 8 % patch apply 30 minute foot ; second group , participant receive placebo patch apply 30 minute foot . Participants involve study approximately 12 week visit clinic approximately 6 time .
